review: I recently underwent a surgery under Dr. Kishore, I had a tibula+ fibula multiple fractures situation and it was a surgery involving twin-plating. However, I was very confident about it since the beginning. And see, we did it. 10/10. I’d definitely recommend.

I had consulted the doctor and it was for health concern, ****** *** ***** I am fully satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Visited for back pain related issue. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. X-ray and scanning was done. There was not much waiting time in the hospital. I am good now and no problem. Hospitality was good. Physiotherapy was suggested by doctor. Doctor was friendly.

I had consulted the doctor as I had neck pain issue. *** ****** *** **** ** ******** *** ** *** ** ******* ***** I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I was able to recover. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. There was waiting time in the hospital, it was for 30 minutes. Hospitality was fine. I am good now.

As per appointment the time was 11.45 am. During confirmation PRO told us to come at 1 pm as doctor was busy in surgery. We went there at 12.45 pm. Till 2.10 pm doctor didn’t inform whether he is coming or not. Despite of several Phone calls from his staff he even not bothered to pickup the phone and reply whether he is cmng or not. We unnecessarily wrested our time in your hospital. It’s is surprising and even shocking that hoe can the most senior doctor behave like ................., person. Henceforth neither we will recommend Shushrut Hospital not we prefer to go there.

I had visited the hospital and it was ortho related issue. ********* *** **** ***** I am fully satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor and it was useful for me. I am good now. Hospitality was good.

review: Fees charged was too much...After an expensive consulting fee I was accepting that he would have provide me with the medical certificate  but I had to pay for the medical certificate separately, which I think is not correct.He should have included the same in the consulting fees itself
